display_html:
data UpdateState
  • = UpdateRegistered SlotNo
  • | UpdateActive (Set KeyHash)
  • | UpdateConfirmed SlotNo
  • | UpdateStablyConfirmed (Set KeyHash)
  • | UpdateCandidate SlotNo EpochNo
  • | UpdateStableCandidate EpochNo
name: UpdateState UpdateRegistered UpdateActive UpdateConfirmed UpdateStablyConfirmed UpdateCandidate UpdateStableCandidate

display_html:
data ProtocolParamsByron = ProtocolParamsByron {
  • byronGenesis ∷ Config
  • byronPbftSignatureThreshold ∷ Maybe PBftSignatureThreshold
  • byronProtocolVersion ∷ ProtocolVersion
  • byronSoftwareVersion ∷ SoftwareVersion
  • byronLeaderCredentials ∷ Maybe ByronLeaderCredentials
  • byronMaxTxCapacityOverrides ∷ Overrides ByronBlock
}

data ByronLeaderCredentials = ByronLeaderCredentials {
  • blcSignKey ∷ SigningKey
  • blcDlgCert ∷ Certificate
  • blcCoreNodeId ∷ CoreNodeId
  • blcLabel ∷ Text
}
name: ByronLeaderCredentials ByronLeaderCredentials $sel:blcSignKey:ByronLeaderCredentials $sel:blcDlgCert:ByronLeaderCredentials $sel:blcCoreNodeId:ByronLeaderCredentials $sel:blcLabel:ByronLeaderCredentials
